  • Method Details

    • updateGamemode

      public void updateGamemode​(int i)
      Updates the gamemode in the World class based on the gamemode selected from the GamemodeSelectionScreen class
      Parameters:
      i - integer that represents the gamemode, 1 for KoTH and 2 for deathmatch
